metadata.title: 英语词汇量测试题库
metadata.description: 专业英语词汇量测试题库，包含4个难度级别

questions.question: 选择单词 'abandon' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: They had to abandon their car and walk home.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ability' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She has the ability to solve difficult problems.

questions.question: 选择单词 'absolutely' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adverb. 完全地；绝对地；确实
questions.example_sentence: I absolutely agree with your opinion.

questions.question: 选择单词 'accept' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: He accepted the job offer immediately.

questions.question: 选择单词 'accident' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: There was a car accident on the highway.

questions.question: 选择单词 'achieve' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She worked hard to achieve her goals.

questions.question: 选择单词 'active' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 积极的；活跃的；主动的
questions.example_sentence: He is very active in the community.

questions.question: 选择单词 'actual' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 实际的；真实的；真正的
questions.example_sentence: The actual cost was higher than expected.

questions.question: 选择单词 'add' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Please add sugar to my coffee.

questions.question: 选择单词 'address' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: What is your home address?

questions.question: 选择单词 'adequate' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 足够的；适当的；胜任的
questions.example_sentence: The salary is adequate for living expenses.

questions.question: 选择单词 'adjust' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: You need to adjust the brightness on your screen.

questions.question: 选择单词 'admire' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: I admire her dedication to work.

questions.question: 选择单词 'admit' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: verb. 承认；准许进入；容纳
questions.example_sentence: He admitted making a mistake.

questions.question: 选择单词 'adopt' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: They decided to adopt a child from the orphanage.

questions.question: 选择单词 'advance' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Technology continues to advance rapidly.

questions.question: 选择单词 'advantage' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 优势；好处；有利条件
questions.example_sentence: Living in the city has many advantages.

questions.question: 选择单词 'adventure' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Their trip to Africa was a great adventure.

questions.question: 选择单词 'advice' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Can you give me some advice about my career?

questions.question: 选择单词 'affect' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The weather will affect our travel plans.

questions.question: 选择单词 'afford' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: verb. 负担得起；提供；给予
questions.example_sentence: I can't afford to buy a new car right now.

questions.question: 选择单词 'afraid' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 害怕的；担心的；遗憾的
questions.example_sentence: She is afraid of spiders.

questions.question: 选择单词 'afternoon' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Let's meet this afternoon.

questions.question: 选择单词 'again' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Please say that again.

questions.question: 选择单词 'against' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: He is against the new policy.

questions.question: 选择单词 'agenda' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The first item on the agenda is the budget review.

questions.question: 选择单词 'aggressive' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 侵略性的；积极的；进取的
questions.example_sentence: The company needs a more aggressive marketing strategy.

questions.question: 选择单词 'allocate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The government will allocate funds for education.

questions.question: 选择单词 'alternative' 的正确含义：

options.1: 替代选择；供选择的事物

questions.explanation: noun. 替代选择；供选择的事物
questions.example_sentence: We need to find an alternative solution to this problem.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ambiguous' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 模糊的；歧义的；不明确的
questions.example_sentence: The instructions were ambiguous and confusing.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ambition' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Her ambition is to become a successful entrepreneur.

questions.question: 选择单词 'analyze' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: We need to analyze the data carefully.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ancient' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 古代的；古老的；旧时的
questions.example_sentence: They discovered ancient ruins in the forest.

questions.question: 选择单词 'anticipate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: We anticipate a large crowd at the concert.

questions.question: 选择单词 'anxiety' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She felt anxiety about the upcoming exam.

questions.question: 选择单词 'apparent' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 明显的；表面上的；显然的
questions.example_sentence: It was apparent that he was lying.

questions.question: 选择单词 'appeal' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The design really appeals to young people.

questions.question: 选择单词 'appearance' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She cares a lot about her appearance.

questions.question: 选择单词 'appreciate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: I really appreciate your help.

questions.question: 选择单词 'approach' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: We need to approach this problem differently.

questions.question: 选择单词 'appropriate' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 适当的；合适的；恰当的
questions.example_sentence: Wear appropriate clothing for the occasion.

questions.question: 选择单词 'approve' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The board approved the new policy.

questions.question: 选择单词 'arbitrary' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 任意的；武断的；专断的
questions.example_sentence: The decision seemed arbitrary and unfair.

questions.question: 选择单词 'arrange' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Can you arrange a meeting for next week?

questions.question: 选择单词 'arrest' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The police arrested the suspect.

questions.question: 选择单词 'arrogant' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 傲慢的；自负的；高傲的
questions.example_sentence: His arrogant attitude made him unpopular.

questions.question: 选择单词 'articulate' 的正确含义：

options.1: 清楚表达的；发音清晰的

questions.explanation: adjective. 清楚表达的；发音清晰的
questions.example_sentence: She gave an articulate presentation.

questions.question: 选择单词 'artificial' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 人工的；人造的；虚假的
questions.example_sentence: The flowers look artificial.

questions.question: 选择单词 'assess' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: We need to assess the damage from the storm.

questions.question: 选择单词 'assign' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The teacher will assign homework for the weekend.

questions.question: 选择单词 'assimilate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: It takes time to assimilate new information.

questions.question: 选择单词 'asylum' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 庇护；收容所；精神病院
questions.example_sentence: He sought asylum in the United States.

questions.question: 选择单词 'atlas' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: I need an atlas to find the location.

questions.question: 选择单词 'aura' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She has a mysterious aura about her.

questions.question: 选择单词 'authentic' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 真实的；正宗的；可靠的
questions.example_sentence: This is an authentic Italian restaurant.

questions.question: 选择单词 'autonomy' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The region wants more autonomy.

questions.question: 选择单词 'auxiliary' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 辅助的；备用的；副的
questions.example_sentence: The hospital has an auxiliary power system.

questions.question: 选择单词 'avalanche' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The avalanche buried the village.

questions.question: 选择单词 'avert' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: They took action to avert the crisis.

questions.question: 选择单词 'aviation' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The aviation industry is growing rapidly.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bachelor' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 单身汉；学士；未婚男子
questions.example_sentence: He is still a bachelor at thirty.

questions.question: 选择单词 'baffle' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The puzzle completely baffled me.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bald' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 秃的；光秃的；坦率的
questions.example_sentence: He is going bald at a young age.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bamboo' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Pandas eat bamboo.

questions.question: 选择单词 'banquet' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The wedding banquet was magnificent.

questions.question: 选择单词 'barren' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 贫瘠的；不育的；无效果的
questions.example_sentence: The land is barren and unproductive.

questions.question: 选择单词 'basil' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: Fresh basil is essential for this recipe.

questions.question: 选择单词 'batch' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 一批；一组；一批产品
questions.example_sentence: The first batch of products sold out quickly.

questions.question: 选择单词 'beacon' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The beacon guided ships to safety.

questions.question: 选择单词 'beetle' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: A beetle crawled across the path.

questions.question: 选择单词 'belligerent' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 好战的；挑衅的；交战中的
questions.example_sentence: His belligerent tone made everyone uncomfortable.

questions.question: 选择单词 'benchmark' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: This product sets a new benchmark for quality.

questions.question: 选择单词 'berate' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: verb. 严厉批评；斥责；责骂
questions.example_sentence: The boss berated him for the mistake.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bias' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: There is a bias against women in hiring.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bilateral' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 双边的；两方面的；双侧的
questions.example_sentence: They signed a bilateral agreement.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bizarre' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 奇异的；怪异的；离奇的
questions.example_sentence: She had a bizarre dream last night.

questions.question: 选择单词 'blunder' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: It was a costly blunder on his part.

questions.question: 选择单词 'boast' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: He likes to boast about his achievements.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bolster' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The evidence bolstered his argument.

questions.question: 选择单词 'bombard' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: verb. 轰炸；大量提问；连续攻击
questions.example_sentence: Reporters bombarded the politician with questions.

questions.question: 选择单词 'aberration' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 偏差；异常现象；心理失常
questions.example_sentence: The sudden change in behavior was just an aberration.

questions.question: 选择单词 'abnegation' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 放弃；克制；自我否定
questions.example_sentence: The monk practiced abnegation of worldly pleasures.

questions.question: 选择单词 'abstruse' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 深奥的；难懂的；晦涩的
questions.example_sentence: The professor's lecture was too abstruse for most students.

questions.question: 选择单词 'acquiesce' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: She reluctantly acquiesced to their demands.

questions.question: 选择单词 'adulation' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 奉承；谄媚；过度赞扬
questions.example_sentence: The celebrity was surrounded by adulation.

questions.question: 选择单词 'aesthetic' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 美学的；审美的；美观的
questions.example_sentence: The building has great aesthetic appeal.

questions.question: 选择单词 'affinity' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 亲和力；喜好；密切关系
questions.example_sentence: She has an affinity for classical music.

questions.question: 选择单词 'alacrity' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: He accepted the invitation with alacrity.

questions.question: 选择单词 'altruism' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 利他主义；无私；利他
questions.example_sentence: Her altruism inspired others to help.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ameliorate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The new policy will ameliorate working conditions.

questions.question: 选择单词 'anachronism' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 时代错误；过时的事物；不合时宜
questions.example_sentence: Using a quill pen in modern times is an anachronism.

questions.question: 选择单词 'anomaly' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 异常；反常现象；不规则
questions.example_sentence: The data showed an anomaly in the results.

questions.question: 选择单词 'antipathy' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: There was clear antipathy between the two groups.

questions.question: 选择单词 'apocryphal' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 虚构的；可疑的；杜撰的
questions.example_sentence: The story about his childhood is probably apocryphal.

questions.question: 选择单词 'arbitrate' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: They hired a neutral party to arbitrate the dispute.

questions.question: 选择单词 'ascendancy' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 支配地位；优势；至高无上
questions.example_sentence: The party gained ascendancy in the election.

questions.question: 选择单词 'assiduous' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 勤奋的；专心致志的；不懈的
questions.example_sentence: Her assiduous studying paid off.

questions.question: 选择单词 'austerity' 的正确含义：
questions.example_sentence: The country implemented economic austerity measures.

questions.question: 选择单词 'autocratic' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: adjective. 专制的；独裁的；专横的
questions.example_sentence: His autocratic leadership style was criticized.

questions.question: 选择单词 'axiom' 的正确含义：
questions.explanation: noun. 公理；自明之理；原理
questions.example_sentence: It is an axiom that practice makes perfect.
